ActionsSettings.name: ActionsSettings
ActionsSettings.label: Actions Settings
ActionsSettings.description: Represents ActionsSettings metadata component used in Salesforce deployments and package development.

FullName.description: The unique identifier for this metadata component

enableDefaultQuickActionsOn.description: enable Default Quick Actions On field of ActionsSettings metadata component.

enableMdpEnabled.description: enable Mdp Enabled field of ActionsSettings metadata component.

enableThirdPartyActions.description: enable Third Party Actions field of ActionsSettings metadata component.
